items.sentence: Tom couldn\'t figure out what Mary really wanted.
Tom didn\'t know that he had done anything wrong.
Tom didn\'t need to hurry. He had plenty of time.
Tom doesn\'t doubt that Mary will arrive on time.
Tom doesn\'t even know how to start a lawn mower.
Tom became a member of this club three years ago.
Tom began talking about what he did for a living.
Tom bent down to pick up something off the floor.
Tom brushes his teeth at least three times a day.
Tom can read more than one hundred pages an hour.
Can you give me a brief description of the thief?
Can you manage to carry the suitcase by yourself?
Close the door after you when you leave the room.
Tom walked down the hall and into Mary\'s office.
Tom wanted Mary to know that he didn\'t hate her.
What surprised me was that Tom didn\'t know Mary.
What\'s your favorite song by the Rolling Stones?
You\'d be surprised what you can learn in a week.
You\'ll have more fun if you do what I suggested.
This piano has probably not been tuned for years.
What was the best present you got last Christmas?
It seems like you\'re in a bad mood this morning.
It wouldn\'t be the first time that has happened.
It\'s about time you stopped watching television.
It\'s been a long time since I last spoke French.
Tom bet me thirty dollars that I couldn\'t do it.
Tom couldn\'t believe that Mary really loved him.
I can\'t help you if I don\'t know where you are.
Tom doesn\'t have any idea what Mary is thinking.
Tom doesn\'t know how much money I spent on this.
Tom doesn\'t know how to use the washing machine.
Tom doesn\'t like women who wear too much makeup.
I have just had one of the worst days of my life.
I have quite a few friends who speak French well.
I just wish I could speak French a little better.
It would probably be cheaper to do that yourself.
I think you don\'t have enough money to buy that.
I think you know exactly what I\'m talking about.
I thought Mary said she didn\'t have a boyfriend.
Do you think Tom will like the gift I bought him?
Does anybody know if the cafeteria is still open?
Everybody knows that he likes her and vice versa.
I\'m sick of hearing the same thing all the time.
I\'m sorry I lost my temper and said rude things.
It was wise of Tom to take his umbrella with him.
It was you that was responsible for the accident.
It will be dark by the time the police come here.
It would be a good idea if you apologized to Tom.
Tom can\'t really be as rich as people say he is.
Tom can\'t remember where he buried the treasure.
